title: React Storybook Configure
description: Set up Storybook for a React app or library.

project.description: Project for which to generate Storybook configuration.
project.x-prompt: For which project do you want to generate Storybook configuration?

interactionTests.x-prompt: Do you want to set up Storybook interaction tests?

configureCypress.x-deprecated: Use interactionTests instead. This option will be removed in v19.

generateStories.description: Automatically generate `*.stories.ts` files for components declared in this project?
generateStories.x-prompt: Automatically generate *.stories.ts files for components declared in this project?

generateCypressSpecs.description: Automatically generate test files in the Cypress E2E app generated by the `cypress-configure` generator.
generateCypressSpecs.x-deprecated: Use interactionTests instead. This option will be removed in v19.

configureStaticServe.description: Specifies whether to configure a static file server target for serving storybook. Helpful for speeding up CI build/test times.
configureStaticServe.x-prompt: Configure a static file server for the storybook instance?

cypressDirectory.description: A directory where the Cypress project will be placed. Placed at the root by default.
cypressDirectory.x-deprecated: Use interactionTests instead. This option will be removed in v19.

js.description: Generate JavaScript story files rather than TypeScript story files.

tsConfiguration.description: Configure your project with TypeScript. Generate main.ts and preview.ts files, instead of main.js and preview.js.

linter.description: The tool to use for running lint checks.

ignorePaths.description: Paths to ignore when looking for components.
